metrics_token_explain: Tokens secure access to your time series data. Each token defines permissions, and can optionally include labels (key-value pair). The labels are automatically added as a filter for reading, and attached to written data with the token bearing these labels. For more information, see our guides.
metrics_token_no_token: There is no token for this application
metrics_token_delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete this token?
metrics_token_err_get: An error has occurred retrieving the tokens
metrics_token_err_create: An error has occurred creating the token
metrics_token_err_revoke: An error has occurred revoking the token
metrics_token_err_update: An error has occurred updating the token
